name: Rotundra
description:
You, the Fox, round and chonky, must roll around the tundra to find food to grow more and more. The more you grow, the harder it is to control your momentum! Make sure you find your next meal before you starve!

The controls are really simple; all you need to do is use WASD to move, and stay within range of your prey for enough time to eat it and grow bigger.

This game was made for the Academy of Interactive Entertainment's "End of Year Game Jam", the theme of which was "Growth". 

Credits:

Travis Fisk - Modeled + Textured Fox and Rabbit characters + illustrated UI

Travis Benton - Modeled terrain + made particle FX

Audrey Meyer - Created shaders, rigged characters

Jenée  Creviston - Modeled + textured environmental props

Justin Carter - Modeled +  Textured Mouse and Seal characters,  illustrated title screen + banner images

Joshua Yang - Programmed literally everything

Jorden - Music/Sound
